MarkdownBlockBase.code_block: description: Provides a means to specify the source of a binding in terms of a relative relationship in the run-time object graph. title: {RelativeSource} markup extension' ms.assetid: B87DEF36-BE1F-4C16-B32E-7A896BD09272
<Rectangle Fill="Orange" Width="200" Height="{Binding RelativeSource={RelativeSource Self}, Path=Width}" />
